;How does penny public sale work? Imagine your friend is usually auctioning off his entire assortment of signed Beatles records. He calls for a garage auction except in this instance he mentions that each time you or any one for example bids, he has to position 1 dollar in some sort of box. That means each of your bid costs you 1 dollar. At the finish the last man standing will win the item. Imagine you being the lucky winner and the final price have been $500, which means they had 500 bids on the item. If you had set bid 50 times your final price will get $50 + $500; $550.
